Instruction: Cut the radicchio head into quarters, leaving the core intact to hold the leaves together.'
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, balsamic vinegar, honey, salt, and black pepper to make the marinade.'
'Brush both sides of the radicchio quarters with the marinade.'
Place the radicchio quarters on the grill, cut side down.'
Grill for 3-4 minutes per side, or until charred and slightly wilted.'
'Remove from the grill and transfer to a serving platter.'
'Drizzle any remaining marinade over the grilled radicchio.'
